code: import React from'react';import'./Modal.css';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faXmark}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ModalEditPost=_ref=>{let{active,setActive,setText,text,handleSubmit}=_ref;const handleClose=()=>{setActive(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:active?'modal active':'modal',onClick:()=>setActive(false),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:active?'modal-content active':'modal-content',onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"post-create-header-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Edit post"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cancel-btn",onClick:handleClose,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faXmark})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:text,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value),className:"text-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn-action",children:"Update post"})]})]})});};export default ModalEditPost;
